original_text: It also comes from people of other nations who came to live in Samaria's cities. The great King Ashurbanipal sent those people to live in Samaria and in the region that is on the west side of the River Euphrates.
korean_text: 그 밖에 백성 곧 존귀한 오스납발이 사마리아 성과 유브라데 강 건너편 다른 땅에 옮겨 둔 자들과 함께 고발한다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: It also comes from people of other nations
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 다른 나라 사람들에게서 온 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who came to live in Samaria's cities
sentences.korean_translation: 사마리아 도시들에 살기 위해 온 사람들입니다

sentences.original_text: The great King Ashurbanipal sent those people
sentences.korean_translation: 위대한 앗수르바니팔 왕이 그 사람들을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: that is on the west side of the River Euphrates
